## CustomerProductReviewQuery type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CustomerProductReviewQuery = {
    customer?: Maybe<{
        reviews: {
            items: Array<Maybe<{
                average_rating: number;
                nickname: string;
                summary: string;
                text: string;
                created_at: string;
                ratings_breakdown: Array<Maybe<{
                    name: string;
                    value: string;
                }>>;
                product: {
                    name?: Maybe<string>;
                    uid: string;
                } | {
                    name?: Maybe<string>;
                    uid: string;
                } | {
                    name?: Maybe<string>;
                    uid: string;
                } | {
                    name?: Maybe<string>;
                    uid: string;
                } | {
                    name?: Maybe<string>;
                    uid: string;
                } | {
                    name?: Maybe<string>;
                    uid: string;
                };
            }>>;
            page_info: {
                current_page?: Maybe<number>;
                page_size?: Maybe<number>;
                total_pages?: Maybe<number>;
            };
        };
    }>;
};
```
